description: Mezcal provides a slightly smoky note and an element of surprise to this cocktail created by Will Noland of Brooklyn’s Sidecar He named it after what he considers ‘‘the greatest transvestite-biker-exploitation movie of all time,’’ not just its pretty color.
title: The Pink Angel Recipe
title_page: The Pink Angel Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Mezcal provides a slightly smoky note and an element of surprise to this cocktail created by Will Noland of Brooklyn’s Sidecar. He named it after what he considers ‘‘the greatest transvestite-biker-exploitation movie of all time,’’ not just its pretty color.
Featured in: How To Pre Game Like A Grown Up.
Learn: How to Make Cocktails
